___destination.description: Address to receive XRP claims against this channel.

___previousAffectingTransactionLedgerVer.description: The ledger version that the transaction identified by the `previousAffectingTransactionID` was validated in.

___balance.description: The total amount of XRP delivered by this channel.

___account.description: Address that created the payment channel.

___amount.description: The total amount of XRP funded in this channel.

___previousAffectingTransactionID.description: Hash value representing the most recent transaction that affected this payment channel.

___settleDelay.description: Amount of seconds the source address must wait before closing the channel if it has unclaimed XRP.

___cancelAfter.description: Time when this channel expires as specified at creation.

___publicKey.description: Public key of the key pair the source will use to sign claims against this channel.
